00033 #ifndef DATASOURCE_H_
00034 #define DATASOURCE_H_
00035 
00036 #include "libidx.h"
00037 #include "Ebl.h"
00038 
00039 namespace ebl {
00040 
00041   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel> class LabeledDataSource {
00042   public:
00043     Idx<Tdata>                                   data;
00044     Idx<Tlabel>                                  labels;
00045     typename Idx<Tdata>::dimension_iterator      dataIter;
00046     typename Idx<Tlabel>::dimension_iterator     labelsIter;
00047 
00049     LabeledDataSource();
00050 
00054     LabeledDataSource(Idx<Tdata> &inputs, Idx<Tlabel> &labels);
00055 
00056     virtual ~LabeledDataSource() {};
00057 
00059     void virtual fprop(state_idx &datum, Idx<Tlabel> &label);
00060 
00062     virtual int size();
00063 
00065     // TODO: implement or get rid of tell?
00066     virtual int tell() { return -1; };
00067 
00069     virtual void next();
00070 
00072     virtual void seek_begin();
00073   };
00074 
00076 
00082   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00083     class MnistDataSource : public LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> {
00084   public:
00085     intg width;
00086     intg height;
00087     double bias;
00088     double coeff;
00089     
00091     MnistDataSource() {};
00092 
00100     MnistDataSource(Idx<Tdata> &inp, Idx<Tlabel> &lbl, intg w, intg h, double b,
00101                     double c);
00102     virtual ~MnistDataSource () {}
00103 
00104     void init(Idx<Tdata> &inp, Idx<Tlabel> &lbl, intg w, intg h, double b,
00105               double c);
00106 
00110     void virtual fprop(state_idx &out, Idx<Tlabel> &label);
00111   };
